description.value:
Gain Unnatural Toughness (x2) and Unnatural Strength (x2) for 1d5 Rounds. Afterwards permenantly reduce Strength and Toughness by 1d5.

Requirements

Common Availability in Hive Volg

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: 100 T
